scripts.build: echo "BUILD SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && export PNPM_HOME_DIR="/workspace/.pnpm_home_local" && mkdir -p "$PNPM_HOME_DIR/bin" && echo "Installing pnpm v10.11.0 into $PNPM_HOME_DIR..." && npm install pnpm@10.11.0 --no-save --prefix="$PNPM_HOME_DIR" && export LOCAL_PNPM_PATH="$PNPM_HOME_DIR/node_modules/.bin/pnpm" && if [ ! -f "$LOCAL_PNPM_PATH" ]; then LOCAL_PNPM_PATH="$PNPM_HOME_DIR/bin/pnpm"; fi && echo "Verifying pnpm installation: $($LOCAL_PNPM_PATH --version)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && echo "Explicitly creating /workspace/node_modules/.bin and testing writability..." && mkdir -p /workspace/node_modules/.bin && touch /workspace/node_modules/.bin/test_writable_file.txt && ls -la /workspace/node_modules/.bin && echo "Running pnpm install (force, frozen lockfile, debug loglevel) from /workspace using $LOCAL_PNPM_PATH..." && "$LOCAL_PNPM_PATH" install --force --frozen-lockfile --loglevel debug && echo "Listing /workspace/node_modules/.bin AFTER pnpm install to confirm nx shim..." && ls -la /workspace/node_modules/.bin && echo "Running nx build test-app from /workspace using direct call to /workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx..." && /workspace/node_modules/.bin/nx build test-app --configuration=production && echo "BUILD SCRIPT FINISHED."
scripts.start: echo "START SCRIPT STARTED - CWD: $(pwd)" && export PNPM_HOME_DIR="/workspace/.pnpm_home_local" && export LOCAL_PNPM_PATH="$PNPM_HOME_DIR/node_modules/.bin/pnpm" && if [ ! -f "$LOCAL_PNPM_PATH" ]; then LOCAL_PNPM_PATH="$PNPM_HOME_DIR/bin/pnpm"; fi && echo "Verifying pnpm installation for start: $($LOCAL_PNPM_PATH --version)" && echo "Ensuring CWD is /workspace for core operations..." && if [ "$(pwd)" != "/workspace" ]; then cd /workspace; else echo "Already in /workspace"; fi && /workspace/node_modules/.bin/serve -s dist/apps/test-app/browser -l tcp://0.0.0.0:${PORT:-8080}
